issue.title: [C++] Add compute kernel test for scalar array timestamp comparison
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16425](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16425). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, in scalar_compare_test.cc, TestCompareTimestamps tests are implemented only for Basics and DifferentParameters.
